fields.Title: Reliable Goal Status Dashboards
fields.Need Statement: Restore exec trust with accurate, real-time goal & performance reporting; friction-free enterprise roll-ups and function filters.
fields.CHRO Value: Rebuilds HR credibility; enables accountable culture across functions.
fields.Deal Accelerators: Fast-start filter fix; CHRO-ready roll-up view.

fields.Title: Function-Level Development Insights
fields.Need Statement: Show which departments / regions lag in goal entry & development planning; support DEI and cultural compliance.
fields.CHRO Value: Strategic development focus by region & function; improves alignment and DEI outcomes.
fields.Deal Accelerators: Dashboard mock-up by country/function; trend comparison for compliance.

fields.Title: Institutionalised SLA Reviews
fields.Need Statement: Formalise monthly executive-service cadence linking platform usage to HR outcomes; reduce escalations and blind spots.
fields.CHRO Value: Prevents issues, supports annual talent milestones, deepens strategic partnership.
fields.Deal Accelerators: Monthly SLA cadence proposal; baseline-to-trend impact report.

fields.Title: Dynamic HRIS-Integrated Reporting
fields.Need Statement: Eliminate Excel splicing by integrating HRIS data (active/inactive, hire/term dates, role filters) into TalentGuard reporting suite.
fields.CHRO Value: One source of truth; improves decision confidence and data integrity.
fields.Deal Accelerators: 60-day pilot with hire/term filters; auto-flag compliance alerts.
